page.title: 08LAW & ORDER
page.content: On both sides of the River there are no{Police Staions}.Residents in Rodley said there was no real crime but some farmers stated that they would like to see a{local Policeman}.They feared vandalism could increase and stealing from property could be easy. On the north side, the nearest{Police Staion} to Rodley is at Newnham, four miles away. Occasionally the police visit the area just to check things out. On the south side, Frampton is the nearest{Police Station}to our area. Residents notice that the Police patrol in a{Panda Car}or on{Motor {Cycles}perhaps once a week, mainly during the night time. The Police and the Community have good relations because the area has a low crime rate.
